text: Bazhou or Ba Prefecture () was a zhou (prefecture) in imperial China in modern Bazhou City, Hebei, China. It existed (intermittently) from 959 to 1913. The modern city of Bazhou, created in 1990, retains its name. ==Geography== The administrative region of Ba Prefecture in Later Zhou is in modern Langfang, Hebei on its western border with Tianjin. It probably includes parts of modern: *Bazhou City *Wen'an County *Dacheng County ==References== * Category:Prefectures of the Jin dynasty (1115–1234) Category:Prefectures of the Song dynasty Category:Prefectures of the Yuan dynasty Category:Subprefectures of the Ming dynasty Category:Departments of the Qing dynasty Category:Prefectures of Later Zhou Category:Former prefectures in Hebei
title: Bà Prefecture
